review_data.title: Ein immer freundliches Personal
review_data.content: Die Linde Oberstrass ist ein wunderbares Restaurant mit gutem Essen und sehr freundlichem Personal. Gerne immer wieder.

review_data.title: Swiss cuisine in a friendly traditional environment
review_data.content: This is one of my favorite restaurants in Zurich; it offers good quality food in a comfortable setting. review_data.title: Great intro to Swiss cuisine

review_data.title: Quiet, friendly and nice restaurant
review_data.content: Last Sunday I was in this restaurant with ca. 10 other people. The location is good, the service is excellent and the food also good. Very nice atmosphere and friendly waiters. I recommend this nice restaurant.

review_data.title: Characteristic atmosphere and good food
review_data.content: I have been twice to this restaurant, both of the times we had good food (generous portion size) and we enjoyed the atmosphere, which is peculiar, quite rustic.

review_data.title: Top choice in Zurich
review_data.content: Linde Oberstrass is one of my favourite places in Zurich. It has a traditional feel, very good food and excellent homebrew beer. It is not as "snobby" as other restaurants around the area, although some dishes from the seasonal menu can be somewhat pricy. Note...More

review_data.title: A nice after-shopping beer
review_data.content: Great place to have a home brewed beer and some local-ish food. Service is so-so, but the beer makes up for it. Will definitely return.

review_data.title: Good enough, no better.

review_data.title: An excellent meal

review_data.title: My home kitchen in Zurich!
review_data.content: I eat regularly at Linde when I am in Zurich. The staff is very nice and polite. The restaurant is nice, nice crowd. The food is very good and the quality/price ratio is great. The menu also changes frequently.

review_data.title: Awesome Gem, Where the Locals eat

review_data.title: Beer is good, food average
review_data.content: They brew their own beer which is recommendable. Also the wine is good. I had the Cordon Bleu which was not that good (hardly any meat), my colleagues from all over Europe were satisfied. They serve Swiss specialities, waiters are German and English speaking.

review_data.title: Very good for Zurich standards

review_data.title: Great food and beer!
